data.current_summary: Read a batch of postal mail by internal ID, or unique property values
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve multiple postal mail objects in a single batch request using their internal IDs or unique property values. Accepts an array of identifiers and returns a batch response containing the requested postal mail objects. Supports partial responses (HTTP 207) if some objects fail to retrieve. Use the `idProperty` parameter to identify objects by alternative unique properties instead of internal ID.

data.current_summary: Archive a batch of postal mail by ID
data.description_suggestion: Archive multiple postal mail objects in a single batch request using their internal IDs or unique property values. data.current_summary: Create a batch of postal mail
data.description_suggestion: Create multiple postal mail objects in a single batch request. Accepts an array of postal mail input objects with required properties and creates them. Returns a batch response (HTTP 201) containing the created postal mail objects with their assigned IDs. Supports partial responses (HTTP 207) if some objects fail to create. Each successfully created object is returned with its internal ID and properties.
data.reasoning: Missing description entirely. Added context about batch creation mechanics, expected input format, response codes (201 for success, 207 for partial), return format including assigned IDs, and error handling to help AI agents understand creation behavior and response structure.

data.current_summary: Update a batch of postal mail by internal ID, or unique property values
data.description_suggestion: Update multiple postal mail objects in a single batch request using their internal IDs or unique property values. Accepts an array of postal mail objects with identifiers and property updates. Performs partial updates on each object - only provided properties are modified. Returns a batch response (HTTP 200) containing the updated objects. Supports partial responses (HTTP 207) if some objects fail to update. Use the `idProperty` parameter to identify objects by alternative unique properties.
data.reasoning: Missing description entirely. Added context about batch update mechanics, partial update semantics, ID flexibility, response codes (200 for success, 207 for partial), return format, and the idProperty parameter to help AI agents understand batch update behavior and error handling.
